Docs.summary: Holds the stack of server channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別可讓連結要求。 如果立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。

Docs.permission: 針對使用基礎結構程式碼執行作業。 要求值： ;權限的值：

Docs.summary: Requests asynchronous processing of a method call on the sinks in the current sink stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會初始化目前接收堆疊中頂端的接收上的非同步處理。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.AsyncProcessResponse%2A>方法。

Docs.exception: The current sink stack is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回所傳回的資料流<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以呼叫`msg`並`headers`參數 (<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSink.GetResponseStream%2A> (`msg`， `headers`)) 上目前接收堆疊中的最上方的接收。 接收堆疊中的最上方接收會維持不變。

Docs.param: The sink to remove and return from the sink stack.
Docs.summary: Pops the information associated with all the sinks from the sink stack up to and including the specified sink.
Docs.returns: Information generated on the request side and associated with the specified sink.
Docs.exception: The current sink stack is empty, or the specified sink was never pushed onto the current stack.

Docs.summary: Provides a delegate to handle a callback after a message has been dispatched asynchronously.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 分派的訊息表示遠端物件上的要求方法呼叫。
<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerChannelSinkStack.ServerCallback%2A>方法使用只供.NET Framework 遠端基礎結構。 您不應該呼叫它直接。

Docs.summary: Stores a message sink and its associated state, and then dispatches a message asynchronously, using the sink just stored and any other stored sinks.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ServerChannelSinkStack.StoreAndDispatch%2A>方法使用只供.NET Framework 遠端基礎結構。 您不應該呼叫它直接。
方法應該只呼叫由傳輸接收完成非同步分派。
